title: Fi ligature
content:
A request from my sister... help us figure out this typeface and that great fi ligature!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/filigature_4882.jpg)

It was in a newsletter from GDUSA yesterday.
author: iffy

comments.content: Looks a lot like [Balance](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023061502/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_balance_bold_roman/), but with a bicameral "g".
From the sister...Fabulous! Thanks for the input!
